#summary Draft documentation of how the REST API will work

|| *Description* || *URI* || *GET* || *PUT* || *DELETE* ||
|| List of Projects || /api/projects/ || List of all projects || - || - ||
|| One Project || /api/projects/<< project_number >>/ || Project details || Updates project || - ||
|| List of Deliverables || /api/deliverables/<< project_number >>/ || List of Deliverables || - || - ||
|| One Deliverables || /api/deliverables/<< project_number >>/<< deliverable_id >> || Deliverable detail || Update the deliverable || Delete the deliverable* ||



* Objects aren't really deleted but disassociated from the project
